home.title: Stay at home
home.desc: Quarantine - a way to stop the spread of coronavirus

alone.title: Limit personal meetings
alone.desc: Fewer contacts - less chance of infection

distance.title: Maintain social distancing
distance.desc: Maintain at least 2 meters (6 feet) distance between yourself and anyone who is coughing or sneezing.

wash.title: Wash your hands frequently
wash.desc: После каждого выхода на улицу обрабатывайте телефон, ключи и банковскую карту

mask.title: Используйте средства защиты
mask.desc: Надевайте маску, если вы чувствуете себя заболевшим

calm.title: Keep calm
calm.desc: Get enough sleep, eat healthy and exercise at home

talk.title: Keep in touch with loved ones
talk.desc: Talk with friends and family, keep in touch with them

list.whodesc: Coronavirus disease (COVID-19) advice for the public
